I see Stars Normal damage. The target is dazzled until healed.

Pinhole The target takes 1 persistent bleed damage that can't be removed until the target is healed.

Disembowel Triple damage.

Conduit The target takes a -2 status penalty to AC and saves against your bombs or spells until the end of yoru next turn.
